text:
Primate Labs | http://www.primatelabs.com/ | Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Full-time Onsite

C++ Software Developer

Primate Labs is hiring C++ software developers to work on Geekbench, our cross-platform benchmark application. If you're excited about computer performance, high-level and low-level software optimization, GPGPU programming, or cross-platform development get in touch! Send your resume to john at primatelabs dot com.
